title: [Large-Scale] Lightweight Gas Separation Membrane Development: Research-Centered Experimental Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Chemistry and Materials Science Knowledge, Experimental Design, and Basic Data Analysis
context.additional_context: Cultivating creative thinking and experimental skills by solving problems in a research environment that closely resembles real-world scenarios.

learning_goals: Understand the manufacturing process of carbon-nitrogen-based separation membranes and perform experimental design.
Analyze the stability and gas adsorption/diffusion characteristics of membranes under varying conditions.
Evaluate lightweight gas separation mechanisms and propose improvement strategies based on experimental results.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
